# cornerStyle

**Instance Property**

A shape for the button among a predetermined set of templates.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var cornerStyle: UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle { get set }
```

## Shaping button corners

- **cornerRadius**: A value that rounds the edges of a paste button.
